div.div: CAN EDUCATORS EMBRACE THE UTOPIA OF CHANGING SOCIETIES?

div.h3: What should a Lifelong learning system prioritise?
What partnerships and alliances can support the Lifelong learning system?
How should a Lifelong learning system work?
What mega trends are influencing the Lifelong Learning system?

span.span: Like every year, the forum is part of a long journey in skills development where international keynote speakers, sponsors, partners, and participants work together to achieve common goals aiming at improving education and TVET.

p.span: Join us in Cagliari for the full event experience or take part virtually in the online sessions.

td.p:
09.15 Conference opening – Giovanni Crisonà
Keynote and introductory speeches
redefining the future of learning…
CAN EDUCATORS EMBRACE THE UTOPIA OF CHANGING SOCIETIES?
Welcome Speeches

ul.li: Paolo Truzzu , Major, Municipality of Cagliari
Giuseppe Fasolino , Councillor for programming and budgeting, Autonomous Region of Sardinia
Massimo Temussi , Director of Centro regionale di programmazione, Autonomous Region of Sardinia

tr.td:
09.45 Andreas Schleicher , Director Education and Skills OECD
The role of work in developing the skills of the future society

10.00 Manuel Galvin , Senior Human Capital Development Expert – Coordinator for Vocational Excellence Project ETF
The understanding of excellence by the ENE network members

10.15 Cloud Bai-Yun , Chief Adviser, Ecctis-UK ENIC
Extending our understanding of “excellence” from the European approach to a global perspective

10.30 Arianna Sala , JRC
LifeComp: The European framework for the personal, social and learning to learn key competence

td.p:
11.00 Shanti Jagannathan , ADB
‘Futuristic’ panel on key reforms and measures needed to consolidate COVID recovery and future growth

li.i: Lincoln University Pro-Vice-Chancellor and Director of Lincoln International Business School

tr.td:
12.00 Tiziana Chiappelli , UNIFI
Freasco.eu opening: Free from sexism and sexual harassment at school

p.strong: 12.15 AER – Regions and stakeholders building the skills of the future

tr.td:
15.00 Keynote and introductory speeches
Centres of vocational excellence

ul.li:
Md Enamul Haque,
Deputy Executive Director, IDEB Research & Technological Institute

p.strong: Lifelong Learning in the age of digital disruptions; Enam’s 7S Model to pursue lifelong learning” for the SIF-2022

ul.li: Urs Hauenstein , President of the International Council for Education and Management

tr.td:
15.15 Youth forum
Lead by Teodora Chifor

td.p:
16.15
Ilze Brante,
Director of Ogre Technical School, Riga (Latvia)
The future of excellence in TVET: Learning by Teaching in Latvia

ul.li: Nikolass Jaunzems , 22 years old teacher @ Ogre Technical School
Ilze Buligina , Ministry of Education, Latvia

td.p:
16.35
Mika Heino,
Omnia FI
The concept of TVET excellence in Finland

b.i: 16.50 Coworking session: Centres of vocational excellence

td.p:
08.45
Day 2 Opening
Keynote and introductory speeches
redefining the future of learning… CAN EDUCATORS EMBRACE THE UTOPIA OF CHANGING SOCIETIES?

tr.td:
09.00 Henry Huggett
A Bridge to World Skills
Skillman China live workshop

td.em: Policy analysis & PNRR Leader, Intellera Consulting

td.p:
Moderated by
Prof Urs Hauenstein
Microcredentials: current and future scenarios

Cloud Bai-Yun,
ENIC NARIC
Hanne Shapiro,
expert consultant
Iraklis Pliakis,
CEDEFOP
Anatolii Garmash , ETF

tr.td:
10.45
Kabada testing
(room 2)
Valentina De Vico
Kristaps Lesinskis

div.p:
11.45 Youth forum
Lead by Teodora Chifor

p.em: Re-Imagine the Education for the Future – Youth Forum results

td.p:
12.45 Filippo Del Ninno,
Human Capital Development Specialist ETF
Skillman declaration: The future of education on global conflicts
– By
Rupert Maclean

div.div:
VENUE
[dt_photos_carousel dis_posts_total=”” image_border_radius=”0px” image_decoration=”shadow” shadow_color=”rgba(0,0,0,0.25)” stage_padding=”100″ autoplay=”y” el_class=”eightypercentwide” project_icon_border_width=”0px” arrow_bg_width=”36x” arrow_border_width=”0px” r_arrow_icon_paddings=”0px 0px 0px 0px” r_arrow_v_offset=”0px” l_arrow_icon_paddings=”0px 0px 0px 0px” l_arrow_v_offset=”0px” category=”799″ css_dt_gallery_carousel=”.vc_custom_1663078940709{margin-left: -10px !important;padding-right: 10px !important;padding-left: 10px !important;}”]
REGISTER

div.p: It gives us great pleasure to invite you to the SIF – Skillman International Forum 2022 on 23-24 November 2022, the annual event to redefine the future of learning in the advanced manufacturing sector, organised in partnership with the European Training Foundation, the Asian Development Bank and the Regional Programming Centre of the Autonomous Region of Sardinia.

This year, the Forum addresses the emerging megatrends caused by the impact of pandemics and conflicts between countries, with the main question: can educators embrace the utopia of changing societies?

Your active participation and support in understanding how our community can contribute to a better world are very valuable to us, in the achievement of a successful event of meaningful engagement for the participants and to enrich the conference’s contents with your relevant expertise.
We would be delighted to have you on board at the event to share your views on the wide range of topics proposed at the Forum.
Thank you for taking the time to consider our invitation. We look forward to having you among our distinguished guests.

div.div:
SKILLMAN SECRETARIAT
[dt_photos_carousel dis_posts_total=”” image_sizing=”proportional” image_border_radius=”0px” item_space=”5″ autoplay=”y” project_icon_border_width=”0px” arrow_bg_width=”36x” arrow_border_width=”0px” r_arrow_icon_paddings=”0px 0px 0px 0px” r_arrow_v_offset=”0px” l_arrow_icon_paddings=”0px 0px 0px 0px” l_arrow_v_offset=”0px” category=”764″ css_dt_gallery_carousel=”.vc_custom_1663078983330{margin-left: -65px !important;}”]
